Text:
the oga office files work on all windows

but the rest is xp only

For anyone having second thoughts of downloading this because it is approximatelly two years old now (December 2011), it worked wonders.

I tried only the WGA one which I needed. I was able to pass the Windows validation check and install updates normally. My Windows version is Window XP Professional with Service Pack 3, though it is somewhat an exception as it is a Volume License Key (VLK) one.

Keep up the good work, lildude! :)

I tried it and I successfully passed both WGA and WMP 11 validations just following your instructions liluser !!!
Thanks a lot. Great job
